product_name: prAna Revolution Natural Sticky Yoga Mat
long_description: The prAna Revolution Natural Sticky Yoga mat gives you plenty of space to stretch out on. Mat is made with 3 layers of biodegradable rubber; heat lamination process eliminates the use of toxic glues. Dual-scrim construction provides an incredibly stable and firm practice surface. The prAna Revolution Natural Sticky Yoga mat is 78 in. (198cm) long x 30 in. (76cm) wide, giving you a large area to stretch out on.
short_description: The prAna Revolution Natural Sticky Yoga mat gives you plenty of space to stretch out on.
